name: Premiership Dreams
description:
Multiplayer soccer manager inspired by old c64 classics like football director and its bigger brother championship manager. Every player and team has their own history and stats.Buy and sell players and take your team to premiership glory.If you are lucky some young superstar will join from your youth team.

Every new game is different as every player in the game are randomly generated at start.Thanks to http://listofrandomnames.com/ as i am to lazy to come up with names myself.
